title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 501 - General Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 501 - General Provisions

State Regulations
§ 501.1 - Service of papers by the commissioner
§ 501.2 - Representation
§ 501.3 - Extension of time
§ 501.4 - Applications for waiver
§ 501.5 to 501.8 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 501

Statutory authority: Transportation Law, §§
84[1], 138, 152, 172, 179[2], 191

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
